title: How to use emote I recently purchased?
body: I recently got the "nightfall icon with even emote" and it's my first emote, so how do I equip and use it or which button to press?

replies.body: Soooooo that emote would have only worked while the Vs Event was going on, which recently ended on 6/29/2017. You still get to keep that icon, and the emote should work again if similar events come back around.
